name: Shaky Shack (Ori Brusilovsky)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 49 Jam in 72 hours. Rate now on Ludum Dare site

Play as a witch trying to perform under an earthquake in her shack.

Shake Shack is a management-puzzle-survival game, where you keep your unstable cauldrons from exploding by mixing magical ingredients.

- Mix and match ingredients of dark magic

- Consult the Spell Book to discover sets of magic symbols

- Keep your cauldrons from exploding

- Survive as many earthquakes as you can

- Every play is different with a completely randomized Spell Book

Credits

Art: Stav Goldstein and Yakier Bunker  
Code: Ori Brusilovsky  
Music & SFX: Shaked Lotan
